titles.title: Providing amounts for the expenses of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct in the One Hundred Ninth Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Provides amounts for the expenses of the HouseCommittee on Standards of Official Conduct in the 109th Congress.
